cards.name: Jake
cards.description: "There are residents, and some are evil."

cards.name: Amanda
cards.fullmessage: Happy Birthday Jakey Bear!! I hope you have an amazing day and I can't wait to see what our 22nd year of our lives hold for us and spending many more birthdays with you! <3

cards.name: Jane
cards.fullmessage: Happy birthday Jake!!!!!!!!! You are hands down one of the funniest people I know and I'm so honored to be your friend!!! Even though you got that gooner Zootopia obsession...... but its okay don't even worry! I hope you have the best birthday ever and in honor of you I will look at one animal today! To make your birthday even better lets go ahead and queue some Valorant! ðŸ–¤

cards.name: Clarisse
cards.fullmessage: HAPPY BIRTHDAYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY!!!!!!!!! I so very grateful that you and I are friends! Thank you for all the laughs and wonderful conversations. You are an amazing buhhhddyyyy. I SEND ALL MY LOVE!ðŸ¤

cards.name: Raymond
cards.fullmessage: Happy Birthday Jake!! I'm lucky to have a friend like you :D Enjoy your special day and I hope your next year in life brings everything you could wish for! -ðŸœ

cards.name: Jesse
cards.fullmessage: HAPPY BIRTHDAY JAKE (aka BoopyDoopy, aka Wizzlewozzle, aka Hatsune Miku, aka Amanda's boyfriend) I know we've only known each other for maybe a week at best, but you've already made me laugh more than most people have in months. I explain your humor as stupid, and that is a compliment. Even though I see you less in top lane than I've been in call with you throughout this week, it's been a really fun time and I'm happy to be apart of uncs birthday, so happy birthday!

cards.name: Waka
cards.description: Happy Birthday Jake! I hope you have a good one!

cards.name: Vault Boy
cards.description: "VAULT TEC wishes you a S.P.E.C.I.A.L. birthday!"

cards.name: John Fallout
cards.fullmessage: hi it's me john fallout i need 2000 bottle caps to get into new vegas so i can save the mojave desert

cards.name: Eric
cards.description: Chicken Jakey, you were submerged into the lakey
cards.fullmessage: "Chicken Jakey, you were submerged into the lakey. You come up and all that appears is your cakey, fresh from the bakery."

cards.name: Luca
cards.description: I hope you have an awesome birthday!
cards.fullmessage: We havenâ€™t known each other long or talked much in the time we have known each other, but the times weâ€™ve hung out have always been super fun! Youâ€™re a super cool guy and a really great friend. I hope you have an awesome birthday!

cards.name: Chris
cards.description: Hope you have a wonderful birthday!
cards.fullmessage: Hey Jake, Happy Birthday! It's been a privilege getting to know you, and I'm looking forward to sharing more great times together. As always, thank you for your continued patience on the rift, but most importantly thank you for always playing with us. I deeply appreciate how caring and easy-going you are as a person. Hope you have a wonderful birthday!
